description.href: Link to a larger version of the image.
description.title: Array of the card title. Key: 'text' for text and 'position' (top | body).
description.byline: Array of the small(er) text below the title, single row. Key: 'text' for text and 'position' (top | body).
description.slot: Empty slot placed in the middle of card.
description.top: Empty slot placed in the top of card.
description.bottom: Empty slot placed in the bottom of card.
description.buttons: Array with buttons that has parameters like href, text and attributeList.
description.icons: Array with icons that has parameters like name, size, attributeList, classList.
description.avatar: Array with the avatar data such as image and name.
description.dropdown: Array with the dropdown parameters as items as an array, direction: top, right, bottom, left, position: top, bottom
description.accordion: Array with the accordion parameters such as heading and content data
description.dark_background: Set the background of the card to a dark color
